inclusion.criterion: ≥1 syncopal spells in the year preceding enrolment
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: ≥-2 points on the Calgary Syncope Symptom Score
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The Calgary Syncope Symptom Score is used to diagnose VVS in patients with structurally normal hearts
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Other causes of syncope, such as ventricular tachycardia
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: An inability to give informed consent
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has history of CAD and prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. He was recently discharged after a negative work-up for syncope.
